'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() ' ' sever side Method: RequirementDoItemRev of Item ' ' Trigger: generic method called from client method: RequirementManualRev ' Dim inn As Aras.IOM.Innovator = Me.newInnovator() Dim thisErr As Aras.IOM.Item = Nothing Dim thisItemType As String = Me.getProperty("item_type","") Dim oldGenItemId As String = Me.getProperty("item_id","")
If (thisItemType = "" Or oldGenItemId = "") Then thisErr = inn.newError("Error versioning Item of ItemType '" & thisItemType & "'. Item Type or Item Id not defined.") Return thisErr End If
Dim plmIdentity As Aras.Server.Security.Identity = Aras.Server.Security.Identity.GetByName("Aras PLM") Dim PermissionWasSet As Boolean = Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.GrantIdentity(plmIdentity)
' Version the affected items Dim tempItem As Aras.IOM.Item tempItem = Me.newItem() tempItem.loadAML("<Item type='" & thisItemType & "' action='version'/>") tempItem.setId(oldGenItemId) tempItem = tempItem.apply() If (tempItem.isError()) Then thisErr = inn.newError("Error versioning Item of ItemType: " & thisItemType & " " & tempItem.getErrorDetail()) Goto Return_HandleManualRev End If Dim NewGenItemId As String = tempItem.getId()
' new version of the document starts at beginning of life cycle and is locked. Unlock it. 'tempItem.unlockItem() 'tempItem.setAction("edit")
tempItem.setAction("update") tempItem.setAttribute("version","0") tempItem.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") tempItem.setAttribute("doGetItem","0") tempItem.setProperty("effective_date","") ' reset effective dates of new version tempItem.setProperty("effective_until_date","") tempItem = tempItem.apply()
Return_HandleManualRev: If (PermissionWasSet=True) Then Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.RevokeIdentity(plmIdentity) End If If IsNothing(thisErr) Then Return tempItem Else Return thisErr ' has ERROR End If
